{{Location Intro|description=<p>Brickstacks is a small village of Toy People in the Broken Sea. It is home to many [[Shattered Toytanium Mines|toytanium miners]] and 'venturers', or those who seek adventure beyond the bounds of Simulanka. The nearby Brickstacks Lighthouse serves as a beacon to guide the venturers home.</p>}}
